Module it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47
Package it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.socket

Class SocketClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.sw.gianpaolocugola47.network.socket.SocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, VirtualView, Remote
public class SocketClient extends Object implements VirtualView, Client
This class represents the client side of the socket connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketClient

      protected SocketClient(Socket socket) throws IOException
      Constructor of the class.
      Parameters:
      socket - the socket to connect to the server
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the output stream

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method starts the client side of the connection. It creates a new thread to run the virtual server. The virtual server reads the messages sent by the server and executes the corresponding actions.

    • setResponse

      protected void setResponse()
      This method sets the response attribute to true.

    • setIdAndRunCli

      protected void setIdAndRunCli(int id)
      This method sets the id attribute to the given id. It also runs the initial CLI launcher, where the player chooses his nickname and whether he wants to play using a CLI or a GUI.
      Parameters:
      id - the id to set

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      This method terminates the game. It prints a message and exits the program. It is called when the server sends a message to terminate the game.
      Specified by:
      terminate in interface VirtualView

    • ping

      public void ping()
      This method pings the server. It is called when the server sends a message to ping. It sends an ack to the server.
      Specified by:
      ping in interface VirtualView

    • startGame

      public void startGame(boolean isLoaded)
      This method starts the game. It initializes the deck and starts the actual CLI or the GUI. It is called when the server sends a message to start the game.
      Specified by:
      startGame in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      isLoaded - true if the game is loaded, false otherwise

    • setMyTurn

      public void setMyTurn()
      This method sets the turn attribute to true and shows the turn. It is called when the server sends a message to set the turn. It also shows the turn on the CLI or the GUI.
      Specified by:
      setMyTurn in interface VirtualView

    • showWinner

      public void showWinner(int id)

      Specified by:
      showWinner in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the winner

      globalObjectives - the global objectives

    • playCard

      public boolean playCard(int onHandCard, int onTableCardX, int onTableCardY, int onTableCardCorner, boolean isFront)
      This method plays a card. It is called when the server sends a message to play a card. It plays a card and returns true if the card is played, false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      playCard in interface Client
      Parameters:
      onHandCard - the card on hand
      onTableCardX - the card on table x
      onTableCardY - the card on table y
      onTableCardCorner - the card on table corner
      isFront - true if the card is front, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true if the card is played, false otherwise

    • connectToServer

      public static void connectToServer()
      This method connects to the server. It asks the user to insert the server IP and port. It creates a new socket and runs the client. If the connection fails, it asks the user to try again.
